prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a massive, rotund creature, vibrant bubblegum pink rubbery skin texture, short black antennae, large black eyes, white puffy ceremonial garment and gold belt
feature_prompt: macro detail on the matte rubber texture, sharp focus on eyes and gold buckle, detailed fabric on garment
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, human proportions, fleshy texture, wrinkles, low quality, overly shiny, flat lighting
